6162805.description:
Stay in the heart of New York.
Conveniently located in the Hell's Kitchen district of New York, Delta Hotels by Marriott New York Times Square is set 2625 feet from Times Square, less than 0.6 mi from Bryant Park and a 13-minute walk from Macy's. The property is around 1 mi from Radio City Music Hall, 1 mi from Broadway Theater and 1.1 mi from Empire State Building. The hotel has a fitness center and a 24-hour front desk.

All guest rooms are newly renovated come with air conditioning, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel all rooms include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Popular points of interest near the accommodations include New York Public Library, Jacob K. Javits Convention Center and Madison Square Garden. The nearest airport is LaGuardia Airport, 8.1 mi from Delta Hotels by Marriott New York Times Square.

The Delta Hotels by Marriott New York Times Square in Times Square features an ideal location and offers a seamless travel experience ensuring you are maximizing your time with what New York City has to offer for both the leisure and business traveler. Fuel your day with grab and go offerings from the restaurant George or dine in at George’s Nephew, a full-service restaurant. While staying with us, you are just steps away from the entertaining Times Square, convenient access to the Theater District, Madison Square Garden, Central Park, Hell’s Kitchen, Hudson Yards and Rockefeller Center. After a day of leisurely curiosity or business unwind in our spacious guestrooms offering a simple yet functional modern design. Explore NYC with easy access to transit, taxi service, Port Authority, and the New York Subway Stations. Travelers enjoy convenient access to all of New York City including international airports LaGuardia Airport (LGA) and John F. Kennedy International Airport (JFK).

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and air purification systems. Each room has a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries, a hairdryer, pen pegboard closet with foldaway hanging desk, luggage rack, bench and chair.

New York Marriott Marquis has meeting space, a Broadway Ballroom with 29,000 square feet, three restaurants, lounge offering panoramic views of Times Square and two terraces. Amenities like a concierge lounge, cloakroom, a safe, a cash machine, WiFi and onsite shops including a souvenir shop are available for guests’ convenience.

Located in Midtown and framed by Central Park, the Ritz-Carlton New York Central Park is the perfect spot for a luxurious stay, featuring experiences tailored to city living.

This prestigious hotel is a short walk from Fifth Avenue shopping and Rockefeller Center and one block from the 57th Street subway station for convenient access to the entire city. Guests will find the iconic Radio City Music Hall and Broadway Theater District only one mile away.

Stylishly designed with a townhouse-inspired atmosphere, each guest room and suite is exquisitely furnished with luxury features and amenities. Guest rooms provide breathtaking views of either Central Park or the city skyline.

Relax in the exclusive La Prairie Spa and rejuvenate with massage, facial, and sauna services, or take advantage of the hotel's state-of-the-art fitness center.

55861.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
55861.description: Please note that guests must be at least 21 years of age to check in to the Shoreham Hotel. Early check-in, when available, will incur an additional fee of USD 99. Package storage is available for additional charges.

56106.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
56106.description:
Stay in the heart of New York.
AKA Central Park offers studio and penthouse suites with living areas and fully-equipped kitchens. Amenities and services include a lounge, meeting space, and complimentary WiFi.

AKA Central Park is 525 feet from the Central Park and Grand Central is 0.9 mi away. Being a minute's walk away from 5th Avenue, shopping destinations like Dolce&Gabana, Bergdorf Goodman, Tiffany & Co and more are within 1640 feet of AKA Central Park.

The suites come with a kitchen that is equipped with stainless steel appliances. The rooms have attached marble bathrooms. Flat-screen TVs are also provided.

A business center with an executive conference room and a Technogym fitness center are available at AKA Central Park. Personal training options are available as well. Gym facilities are only available with a reservation. Guests can also enjoy a private cinema experience at the property.

The Museum of Modern Art and Radio City Music Hall are 2112 feet away.

56985.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
56985.description:
Stay in the heart of New York.
Park Central Hotel offers the convenience of being steps from Central Park. For exercise enthusiasts, the property offers 24-hour onsite fitness center.

Park Central Hotel offers rooms and suites that are equipped with 46-inch flat-screen TVs, desks and in-room safes. Guests can also request for a complimentary coffee maker.

Meeting and event space, a concierge desk, business center and unlimited domestic calling are some of the other amenities offered for guests’ convenience.

Guests at the Park Central can enjoy a meal at Redeye Grill that serves various cuisines or relax with a drink at the Park Lounge. Central Market, a fine foods “grab-and-go” market, offers guests bites from artisanal New York vendors.

Carnegie Hall and the Museum of Modern Art are located within a 5 minute walk of Park Central. Guests can catch a Broadway show at one of the theaters located within 0.6 mi of the property.

57009.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
57009.description:
Please note the resort fee includes the following:

- High-speed wireless Internet (WiFi) for up to 6 devices
- All local, long distance and international phone calls
- Unlimited use of 24/7 Fitness Center (may not be available due to safety guidelines)
- Unlimited use of the Business Center
- Luggage Storage until 23:00
-$1000 for deep cleaning fee

Please note that there is a package handling charge of USD 10 per package per stay for packages weighing under 5 pounds. Additional restrictions apply. Contact property for details.

Valet parking is only available at the 59th Street entrance.

Park Lane New York is a 100% nonsmoking hotel and any violation will be subject to a $500 deep cleaning fee. If found in violation during a guest stay, Park Lane New York reserves the right to ask a guest to depart the hotel room without refund. Park Lane New York reserves the right to visually inspect all guest rooms after 24 hours of refusal of service to ensure the well-being of the guest and the condition of the room.

Upon check-out, any unused funds will be credited back to your account in 72 hours or more per your bank business rules.

58958.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
58958.description:
Stay in the heart of New York.
Located at the crossroads of Central Park and 5th Avenue, this internationally renowned Manhattan hotel is steps away from world class shopping.

The luxurious and spacious rooms at The Plaza boast modern bathrooms with 24-karat gold-plated fixtures and separate rain showers.

The Plaza Hotel is home to The Palm Court Restaurant, one of New York City's finest destinations for Afternoon Tea.

Amenities at The Plaza include exclusive boutiques and health and wellness facilities including a Guerlain Spa and 24-Hour Fitness Center.

59182.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
59182.hotel_name: JW Marriott Essex House New York
59182.description:
Please note, 'breakfast included' rates provide breakfast for 2 guests only. Breakfast is available (surcharge) for extra guests.

606890.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
606890.hotel_name: Le Meridien New York, Central Park
606890.description:
Stay in the heart of New York.
Located 1056 feet from Central Park and 0.8 mi from Times Square, Le Méridien New York, Central Park offers rooms and suites in Midtown Manhattan.

All rooms at Le Méridien New York, Central Park come with 40-inch flat-screen TVs and Beats by Dr. Dre™ sound systems.

Enjoy your evening cocktails on the rooftop bar with panoramic views of the city and Central Park, or treat yourself to a meal and handcrafted cocktails at Kingside Restaurant when staying at the Le Méridien.

Other onsite amenities include fitness center and complimentary nightly turndown service.

Radio City Music Hall is located 2113 feet from the property and Rockefeller Center is 2641 feet away. Columbus Circle is 1588 feet from the property.

270490.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
270490.description: Upon check-in photo identification and credit card is required. All special requests are subject to availability upon check-in. Special requests cannot be guaranteed and may incur additional charges.

5635615.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
5635615.description:
Stay in the heart of New York.
Well located in New York, 5th & 55th Residence Club provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness center, free WiFi and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around a 5-minute walk from Rockefeller Center, 700 yards from Top of the Rock and a 3-minute walk from Museum of Modern Art. The property has room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.

The rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area. Selected rooms come with a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a minibar. Guest rooms in 5th & 55th Residence Club are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

An à la carte, continental or American breakfast is available daily at the property.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St Patrick's Cathedral, Carnegie Hall and Broadway Theatre. LaGuardia Airport is 6.2 miles away.

24900.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
24900.description:
On famous Park Avenue, this modern family-friendly hotel is 2 blocks from Central Park and a 15-minute walk from Rockefeller Center. It features on-site dining and 24-hour concierge services.

The neutrally-colored guest rooms at Loews Regency New York Hotel include modern furnishings and a flat-screen TV. Guests can relax with a drink from the minibar. A work desk is also provided.

Subway access is 2 blocks from Loews Regency New York Hotel. The Metropolitan Museum of Art is 1 mile away.

267962.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
267962.description:
Guests must be at least 21 years or older to check-in.
Please note, 'breakfast included' rates provide breakfast for 2 guests only. Breakfast is available (surcharge) for extra guests.

Please note that the first night's room rate and taxes will be pre-authorized on the credit card used to make the reservation after the booking is made.

76896.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
76896.hotel_name: The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York
76896.description:
The Pierre, A Taj Hotel is located across from Central Park at 61st Street. A part of the New York City skyline with its copper mansard roof, The Pierre offers guests white glove luxury service. The hotel is close to high-end shopping destinations and is only steps away from Bergdorf Goodman. The boutiques of Fifth & Madison Avenues are in close proximity.

The Pierre has played host to many society events since opening in 1930. The hotel's restaurant, Perrine, offers seasonal modern American cuisine with daily specials inspired by Pierre culinary classics. The hotel also offers a bar/lounge, Two E, with traditional afternoon tea by day and live jazz by night every Thursday through Saturday.

Located at the intersection of Midtown and the Upper East Side, white gloved elevator attendants, a Les Clefs d'Or concierge team and trained housekeepers help maintain the quality of service. The Pierre also has Forbes Five Star & AAA Five Diamond to their name.

The Pierre offers a variety of exclusive experiences for young travelers as well. A host of child-friendly amenities await - from special treats to movies, toys and special museum passes on demand.

The Museum Mile is 1.7 mi away. The Central Park Zoo is a short walk from the hotel, and the Concierge team can work with their partners at the Central Park Conservancy to organize special experiences for children.

On arrival at the hotel, The Pierre requires a credit card pre-authorization to cover the value of your stay plus $200 per day to cover additional incidentals. The
authorization will hold the funds until check-out, at which time the amount actually incurred during the stay will be charged.

13002981.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
13002981.description:
Parkside Living City style is located in New York, just a 14-minute walk from Columbia University and 1.9 miles from Metropolitan Museum of Art. The property is around 2 miles from Strawberry Fields, 2.2 miles from Lincoln Center, and 2.6 miles from Central Park. Museum of Modern Art is 3.3 miles away and Radio City Music Hall is 3.4 miles from the apartment.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 4 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 2 bathrooms. A flat-screen TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Carnegie Hall is 2.8 miles from the apartment, while Broadway Theatre is 3 miles from the property. LaGuardia Airport is 7.5 miles away.

13004099.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
13004099.hotel_name: Home is Where The Park Is
13004099.description:
Home is Where The Park Is is located in New York, just 1.9 miles from Metropolitan Museum of Art and 2 miles from Strawberry Fields. The property is around 2.2 miles from Lincoln Center, 2.6 miles from Central Park, and 2.8 miles from Carnegie Hall. Free Wifi is available throughout the property and Columbia University is a 14-minute walk away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 4 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 2 bathrooms. A flat-screen TV is featured. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Broadway Theatre is 3 miles from the apartment, while Museum of Modern Art is 3.3 miles away. LaGuardia Airport is 7.5 miles from the property.

13074797.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
13074797.description:
Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
This property does not accommodate bachelor(ette) or similar parties.
A damage deposit of USD 350 is required. The host charges this 14 days before arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.

291324.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
291324.description:
Located at the juncture of Columbus Circle and Broadway, this 5-star hotel is minutes from Central Park. It features Jean Georges and Nougatine restaurants and the rooms provide kitchenette facilities.

Each spacious room at Trump International New York provides large windows with views of the city or Central Park. They are furnished with a 55-inch flat-screen cable TV and Blue-ray DVD players. The kitchenette offers a dining area and the bathrooms are decorated in marble.

Over 6,000 square feet is dedicated to the Trump Spa. The spa offers unique techniques from around the world with a selection of facials, massages and other treatments. It includes an indoor heated pool and health club with saunas and yoga classes.

New York Trump International is less than one mile from the Radio City Music Hall. Central Park Zoo is also one mile away and LaGuardia Airport is 10 miles from the hotel.

57397.value: New York Central Park, New York, New York, United States
57397.description:
This Manhattan hotel is 272 feet from the Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts. Central Park is 528 feet from the The Empire Hotel New York. It features a seasonal rooftop outdoor pool.

The modern rooms at the The Empire Hotel New York are decorated in earthy tones and equipped with a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. Guests will find a rain shower head in the bathroom.

The seasonal rooftop plunge pool is surrounded by a sun deck with large lounge chairs providing panoramic views of New York City. Food and drink at the Pool Deck is also available.

Times Square is 0.9 mi from the The Empire Hotel New York. The Museum of Arts and Design is 1585 feet away.
